Field.DisplayName: Do you remove it from the NT version output?
Field.Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.
Specifies the reverb type to apply during the cutscene

Field.DisplayName: Normal BGM behavior at the start of cutscenes
Field.Description: Specifies normal BGM behavior at the start of cutscenes

Field.DisplayName: One-shot BGM behavior at the start of the cutscene
Field.Description: Specifies the one-shot BGM behavior at the start of the cutscene

Field.DisplayName: SEID (category: p) specification to post at the end of the cutscene (-1: do not post)
Field.Description: SEID (category: p) specification to post at the end of the cutscene (-1: do not post)

Field.DisplayName: Post at the end of the cutscene SEID_Skip (category: p) specified (-1: do not post)
Field.Description: SEID_ for skipping to post at the end of the cutscene (category: p) specified (-1: not posted)

Field.DisplayName: Cutscene drawing time to unmute immediately after entering [seconds] (less than 0: not canceled in drawing time)
Field.Description: Cutscene drawing time to unmute immediately after entering [seconds] (less than 0: not canceled in drawing time)
